productCard.noPartsAvailable: No catalog parts available, please check your ichub-backend connection/configuration

createDialog.title: Create New Catalog Part
createDialog.materialSharesError: Material shares must total exactly 100% (currently {{total}}%). Please adjust the percentages before creating.

basicInformation.title: Basic Information
basicInformation.description: Essential identifying information for the catalog part including ID, name, description, category, and manufacturing location.

manufacturerPartId.label: Manufacturer Part ID
manufacturerPartId.description: Unique identifier assigned by the manufacturer to this specific part. This ID should be unique within your organization.

name.label: Part Name
name.description: Commercial or technical name of the part. This will be displayed as the main identifier in catalogs and listings.

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Describe the part's purpose, functionality, and key characteristics
description.description: Detailed description of the part including its purpose, functionality, and key characteristics. This helps users understand what the part is for.

category.label: Category
category.description: Classification category that groups similar parts together. Select from common categories or create your own custom category.

bpns.label: BPNS
bpns.description: Business Partner Number Site - identifies the specific manufacturing location or site where this part is produced.

measurements.title: Measurements
measurements.description: Physical measurements of the part including width, height, length, and weight. These help with compatibility and logistics planning.

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: Material composition of the part with percentage breakdown. This information is crucial for recycling, compatibility, and regulatory compliance.
materials.perfectTotal: Perfect! Material shares add up to 100%
materials.adjustWarning: Set your desired percentages freely. Total must equal 100% to create the part (currently {{total}}%)

materialName.label: Material Name
materialName.description: Name of the specific material used in this part (e.g., Steel, Aluminum, Plastic, etc.)

share.label: Share
share.description: Percentage or proportion of this material in the overall composition of the part. All material shares should add up to 100%.

distribution.title: Material Distribution
distribution.description: Visual representation of material composition showing the percentage distribution of different materials used in this part.
distribution.emptyMessage: Add materials with names and shares to see the distribution chart

shareDialog.title: Share with partner ({{partName}})
shareDialog.noPartnersDescription: No partners available. Please add partners in the Partner View to share parts.
shareDialog.shareInfoDescription: Select a partner to share the part with
shareDialog.partnerPlaceholder: Select a partner to share the part with

addSerializedPartDialog.title: Add a serialized part
addSerializedPartDialog.selectPartnerPlaceholder: Select a partner to share with

instanceProductsTable.title: Instance Products
instanceProductsTable.subtitle: Manage and track individual product instances
instanceProductsTable.selectPartMessage: Select a part from the catalog to view and manage its individual product instances.
instanceProductsTable.addFirstInstance: Start by adding your first instance product to track individual items

messages.failedToRegisterTwin: Failed to register twin. Please try again.
messages.failedToShareTwin: Failed to share twin. Please try again.
messages.failedToUnshareTwin: Failed to unshare twin. Please try again.
messages.failedToDeletePart: Failed to delete part. Please try again.
messages.unableToDelete: Unable to delete: invalid part data

deleteDialog.title: Delete Serialized Part
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this serialized part?
deleteDialog.warningRegistered: This part has a registered twin. Deleting it will also remove the twin registration.
deleteDialog.warningShared: This part is currently shared with partners. Deleting it will revoke all shares.

productData.pleaseWait: Please wait while we refresh the twin information

sharing.title: Shared With
sharing.notYetSharedWarning: This part is still not shared, but has already an existing customer part ID prepared for sharing.
sharing.noSharingInsights: No sharing insights are currently available. Share this part with a partner to view the information here.

tooltips.clickToCopySiteOfOrigin: Click to copy Site of Origin

submodels.title: Submodels
submodels.createFirst: Create your first submodel to add detailed specifications
submodels.twinRequiredMessage: You need to create a twin before adding submodels. Use the register button above to create a twin first.

warnings.noShares: This part has not been shared with any partners yet
warnings.noSubmodels: No submodels have been created for this part

messages.twinRequired: Twin must be created before adding submodels. Please create a twin first.

submodelsGrid.title: Digital Twin Submodels
submodelsGrid.noSubmodelsDescription: This digital twin doesn't have any submodel aspects available for viewing.

messages.globalAssetIdCopied: Global Asset ID copied to clipboard

darkSubmodelViewer.title: Submodel Viewer
darkSubmodelViewer.noDataAvailable: No submodel data available or data could not be retrieved.

submodelViewer.title: Digital Twin Submodels
submodelViewer.noSubmodelsDescription: This digital twin doesn't have any submodel aspects available.
